body.p: The coffee maker is new and there are a few differences from standard ones. This is what you will do:

li.p: Put 4 tbsp. from the coffee in the cabinet above the stove into the screen filter.
Turn the dial to the single mug.
Make sure the drip switch above the caraffe is on.
Wait 3 minutes, and then pour your coffee into a mug from the cabinet above the sink.
